name: comparativist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who does comparative studies (= comparing different things, for example comparing the literature or legal systems of different countries) : Most comparativists study domestic legal systems, especially their private law dimensions. She is a comparatist who is mainly interested in US and Latin American fiction.
More examplesFewer examplesThe article is particularly impressive for its comparativist approach to the subject.One of his books is a volume in honour of the great comparatist Erich Auerbach.
